price: Isii (jannata) keessatti wacaafi wal yakkuu hin dhaga’an.
arabic: لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغۡوٗا وَلَا تَأۡثِيمًا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: lā yasmaʿūna fīhā laghwan walā tathīman
